data.eml:eml: A new species of Chiasmocleis (Anura: Microhylidae) from the Iquitos region, Amazonian Peru, with possible direct development

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Moravec, Ji Ř Í, Köhler, Jörn (2007): A new species of Chiasmocleis (Anura: Microhylidae) from the Iquitos region, Amazonian Peru, with possible direct development. Zootaxa 1605: 59-67, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.178781
